thread.title: Decorative Flat Screen Accessory Invented by InventHelp Client (SLC-1125)
thread.title_full: Decorative Flat Screen Accessory Invented by InventHelp Client (SLC-1125) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Decorative Flat Screen Accessory Invented by InventHelp Client (SLC-1125)
text:
One of America's leading inventor service companies, InventHelp is submitting the COMPUTER AND TV DECOR to companies for their review.
PITTSBURGH, PA
.“Flat screens typically come in one of three colors, black, white or silver,” said an inventor, from St. Louis, Mo. “I thought it would be great if there was a way to personalize or decorate the typical boring look, so I invented this.” He invented the COMPUTER AND TV DÉCOR.
The COMPUTER AND TV DÉCOR provides a decorative way to enhance the look of a flat screen television or computer monitor. In doing so, it enables the user to personalize the appearance of a flat screen. As a result, it adds a fashionable flair to any room décor. The invention features a fun and versatile design that is easy to apply and remove. Additionally, the COMPUTER AND TV DÉCOR protects the exterior edges of a television or computer monitor frame and it is producible in design variations.
The inventor described the invention design. “My design allows you to coordinate your computer or TV to your personal tastes and likes.” The invention is patent pending.
The original design was submitted to the St. Louis office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-SLC-1125, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
